content: Dolan has insisted that Oakley needs help, which was also written in the Knicks’ press release following what ensued on Wednesday. In his interview with Kay, the Knicks CEO went as far as to insinuate that Oakley “may have a problem with alcohol, but we don’t know.” Whether or not Oakley is a troubled alcoholic remains in question, but it doesn’t look good on Dolan’s and the Knicks’ part to allude to that when they’re unsure of the truth.
